Description:
We are hiring a Secretary to provide secretarial, reception, and administration services for our Head of Primary. Your role will be essential in maintaining an organized and efficient school office while supporting the Head of Primary with administrative tasks. If you are detail-oriented and have excellent organizational skills, we invite you to join our team and contribute to the smooth functioning of our educational institution.Responsibilities:Prepare various documents and reports for the school and instructional programs.
Act as a liaison between the school and the public, addressing inquiries and providing information.
Assist in scheduling appointments and coordinating meetings.
Support overall site/program activities.
Perform general clerical duties and maintain office orderliness.
Participate in staff training and professional development activities.
Undertake additional duties as needed to support the school community.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in a relevant field.
Proficiency in both written and spoken English and Arabic.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Previous experience in administrative or secretarial roles is a plus.
Proficiency in using computer applications and office equipment.
Strong organizational abilities and attention to detail.
Ability to handle sensitive information with confidentiality.

If you are a proactive and organized individual with a passion for supporting educational environments, we encourage you to apply for the position of Secretary. Join our team and contribute to the success of our school community.
We look forward to welcoming a motivated and efficient School Secretary to our team.
